name: Rhythm Knights: Back In Rhyme - Tech Demo
name_original: Rhythm Knights: Back In Rhyme - Tech Demo
description:
Attention players:

This is a tech demo for Rhythm Knights: Back In Rhyme, the highly anticipated third installment in the Rhythm Knights series. The demo includes two levels and is designed for us to gather feedback before the full game releases.

Get ready to tap your feet and move to the beat with Rhythm Knights: Back In Rhyme, the highly anticipated third installment in the Rhythm Knights series! This hand-drawn 2D rhythm game will have you dodging spikes and catching arrows as you dance to the beat.

But beware: the psychedelic visuals in this game may cause dizzying sensations and, while extremely unlikely, could potentially trigger seizures in those who are extremely prone. So strap in and prepare for a trippy journey through the world of Rhythm Knights: Back In Rhyme.

This tech demo is your chance to get a sneak peek at the game before it's released and give us your feedback. Don't miss out on this opportunity to shape the future of the Rhythm Knights series. So, are you ready to join the Rhythm Knights and get your groove on?

Game By: Dallen Larson

With Additional Art By: ZachJaDa

& Music Composed By: Noobstack
